amendment.description: To amend chapter 27 of title 18, United States Code, to prohibit the unauthorized construction, financing, or, with reckless disregard, permitting the construction or use on one's land, of a tunnel or subterranean passageway between the United States and another country and to direct the United States Sentencing Commission to modify the sentencing guidelines to account for such prohibition.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4556 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4556 proposed by Senator Feinstein. (consideration: CR S7316-7318; text: CR S7316-7317) To amend chapter 27 of title 18, United States Code, to prohibit the unauthorized construction, financing, or, with reckless disregard, permitting the construction or use on one's land, of a tunnel or subterranean passageway between the United States and another country and to direct the United States Sentencing Commission to modify the sentencing guidelines to account for such prohibition.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4556 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4556 proposed by Senator Feinstein.
